subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में किस मंगलवाला पहलूंग है।
explanation_en: The Legacy of Rao Jodha refers to the architectural and historical significance of Jodhpur, established by Rao Jodha. The city is known as Meera Nagar after him.
